result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey D Deford was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jeffrey D Deford is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jeffrey D Deford was found guilty of Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Two Discharge Certificates filed by DOC; copy of 11-7-16 Notice of Case Status Change attached
Defendant to be discharged on 10-27-16; unpaid supervision fees of $20

1:24 P.M. Defendant, Jeffrey D Deford, appeared. Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant requesting childcare for work release, State takes no position, Court will allow childcare subject to jail policies/procedures, JOC to be amended 1:25 P.M.
Hearing on January 5, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
from defendant requesting huber for child care.
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Jeffrey D Deford in court with attorney Richard G. Davis.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1 Judgment to be entered, Ct. 2 dismissed, Court withholds sentence, probation 2 years, 30 days jail w/Huber, Jail start date 12/26/14 at 7:00 P.M., $278.00 costs and $250.00 DNA Surcharge and DNA Sample, AODA and comply,
from Attorney Davis requesting plea/sentencing hearing.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 27, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
Scheduling Order for the September 25, 2014 jury trial.
Jury trial on September 25, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jeffrey D Deford in court with attorney Richard G Davis.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over. Information filed, reading waived. Defendant stood mute. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing on April 24, 2014 at 09:00 am.
from ADA Long asking for a reset of Preliminary Hearing on 4-17-14.
Defendant Jeffrey D Deford in court with attorney Richard G. Davis.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 17, 2014 at 09:00 am.
